original_text: Remember the gift that God's Holy Spirit has given to you. You received that gift when the group of church leaders put their hands on you. They spoke messages from God about how you would serve him. So do not stop using that gift from God.
korean_text: 네 속에 있는 은사 곧 장로의 회에서 안수 받을 때에 예언을 통하여 받은 것을 가볍게 여기지 말며

sentences.original_text: that God's Holy Spirit has given to you
when the group of church leaders put their hands on you
about how you would serve him
So do not stop using that gift from God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 하나님의 그 선물을 사용하기를 그치지 말라
